Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-50495 affecting package ncurses for versions less than 6.4-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-50495 affecting package ncurses for versions less than 6.4-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package ncurses is earlier than 6.4-3, affected by CVE-2023-50495
